a11y.name: noAccessKey
a11y.description: Enforce that the accessKey attribute is not used on any HTML element.

a11y.name: noAriaHiddenOnFocusable
a11y.description: Enforce that aria-hidden="true" is not set on focusable elements.

a11y.name: noAriaUnsupportedElements
a11y.description: Enforce that elements that do not support ARIA roles, states, and properties do not have those attributes.

a11y.name: noAutofocus
a11y.description: Enforce that autoFocus prop is not used on elements.

a11y.name: noDistractingElements
a11y.description: Enforces that no distracting elements are used.

a11y.name: noHeaderScope
a11y.description: The scope prop should be used only on \<th> elements.

a11y.name: noInteractiveElementToNoninteractiveRole
a11y.description: Enforce that non-interactive ARIA roles are not assigned to interactive HTML elements.

a11y.name: noLabelWithoutControl
a11y.description: Enforce that a label element or component has a text label and an associated input.

a11y.name: noNoninteractiveElementToInteractiveRole
a11y.description: Enforce that interactive ARIA roles are not assigned to non-interactive HTML elements.

a11y.name: noNoninteractiveTabindex
a11y.description: Enforce that tabIndex is not assigned to non-interactive HTML elements.

a11y.name: noPositiveTabindex
a11y.description: Prevent the usage of positive integers on tabIndex property

a11y.name: noRedundantAlt
a11y.description: Enforce img alt prop does not contain the word "image", "picture", or "photo".

a11y.name: noRedundantRoles
a11y.description: Enforce explicit role property is not the same as implicit/default role property on an element.

a11y.name: noSvgWithoutTitle
a11y.description: Enforces the usage of the title element for the svg element.

a11y.name: useAltText
a11y.description: Enforce that all elements that require alternative text have meaningful information to relay back to the end user.

a11y.name: useAnchorContent
a11y.description: Enforce that anchors have content and that the content is accessible to screen readers.

a11y.name: useAriaActivedescendantWithTabindex
a11y.description: Enforce that tabIndex is assigned to non-interactive HTML elements with aria-activedescendant.

a11y.name: useAriaPropsForRole
a11y.description: Enforce that elements with ARIA roles must have all required ARIA attributes for that role.

a11y.name: useButtonType
a11y.description: Enforces the usage of the attribute type for the element button

a11y.name: useFocusableInteractive
a11y.description: Elements with an interactive role and interaction handlers must be focusable.

a11y.name: useGenericFontNames
a11y.description: Disallow a missing generic family keyword within font families.

a11y.name: useHeadingContent
a11y.description: Enforce that heading elements (h1, h2, etc.) have content and that the content is accessible to screen readers. Accessible means that it is not hidden using the aria-hidden prop.

a11y.name: useHtmlLang
a11y.description: Enforce that html element has lang attribute.

a11y.name: useIframeTitle
a11y.description: Enforces the usage of the attribute title for the element iframe.

a11y.name: useKeyWithClickEvents
a11y.description: Enforce onClick is accompanied by at least one of the following: onKeyUp, onKeyDown, onKeyPress.

a11y.name: useKeyWithMouseEvents
a11y.description: Enforce onMouseOver / onMouseOut are accompanied by onFocus / onBlur.

a11y.name: useMediaCaption
a11y.description: Enforces that audio and video elements must have a track for captions.

a11y.name: useSemanticElements
a11y.description: It detects the use of role attributes in JSX elements and suggests using semantic elements instead.

a11y.name: useValidAnchor
a11y.description: Enforce that all anchors are valid, and they are navigable elements.

a11y.name: useValidAriaProps
a11y.description: Ensures that ARIA properties aria-* are all valid.

a11y.name: useValidAriaRole
a11y.description: Elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role.

a11y.name: useValidAriaValues
a11y.description: Enforce that ARIA state and property values are valid.

a11y.name: useValidLang
a11y.description: Ensure that the attribute passed to the lang attribute is a correct ISO language and/or country.

complexity.name: noAdjacentSpacesInRegex
complexity.description: Disallow unclear usage of consecutive space characters in regular expression literals

complexity.name: noBannedTypes
complexity.description: Disallow primitive type aliases and misleading types.

complexity.name: noEmptyTypeParameters
complexity.description: Disallow empty type parameters in type aliases and interfaces.

complexity.name: noExcessiveCognitiveComplexity
complexity.description: Disallow functions that exceed a given Cognitive Complexity score.

complexity.name: noExcessiveNestedTestSuites
complexity.description: This rule enforces a maximum depth to nested describe() in test files.

complexity.name: noExtraBooleanCast
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary boolean casts

complexity.name: noForEach
complexity.description: Prefer for...of statement instead of Array.forEach.

complexity.name: noStaticOnlyClass
complexity.description: This rule reports when a class has no non-static members, such as for a class used exclusively as a static namespace.

complexity.name: noThisInStatic
complexity.description: Disallow this and super in static contexts.

complexity.name: noUselessCatch
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary catch clauses.

complexity.name: noUselessConstructor
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary constructors.

complexity.name: noUselessEmptyExport
complexity.description: Disallow empty exports that don't change anything in a module file.

complexity.name: noUselessFragments
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary fragments

complexity.name: noUselessLabel
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary labels.

complexity.name: noUselessLoneBlockStatements
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary nested block statements.

complexity.name: noUselessRename
complexity.description: Disallow renaming import, export, and destructured assignments to the same name.

complexity.name: noUselessStringConcat
complexity.description: Disallow unnecessary concatenation of string or template literals.

complexity.name: noUselessSwitchCase
complexity.description: Disallow useless case in switch statements.

complexity.name: noUselessTernary
complexity.description: Disallow ternary operators when simpler alternatives exist.

complexity.name: noUselessThisAlias
complexity.description: Disallow useless this aliasing.

complexity.name: noUselessTypeConstraint
complexity.description: Disallow using any or unknown as type constraint.

complexity.name: noUselessUndefinedInitialization
complexity.description: Disallow initializing variables to undefined.

complexity.name: noVoid
complexity.description: Disallow the use of void operators, which is not a familiar operator.

complexity.name: noWith
complexity.description: Disallow with statements in non-strict contexts.

complexity.name: useArrowFunction
complexity.description: Use arrow functions over function expressions.

complexity.name: useDateNow
complexity.description: Use Date.now() to get the number of milliseconds since the Unix Epoch.

complexity.name: useFlatMap
complexity.description: Promotes the use of .flatMap() when map().flat() are used together.

complexity.name: useLiteralKeys
complexity.description: Enforce the usage of a literal access to properties over computed property access.

complexity.name: useOptionalChain
complexity.description: Enforce using concise optional chain instead of chained logical expressions.

complexity.name: useRegexLiterals
complexity.description: Enforce the use of the regular expression literals instead of the RegExp constructor if possible.

complexity.name: useSimpleNumberKeys
complexity.description: Disallow number literal object member names which are not base10 or uses underscore as separator

complexity.name: useSimplifiedLogicExpression
complexity.description: Discard redundant terms from logical expressions.

complexity.name: useWhile
complexity.description: Enforce the use of while loops instead of for loops when the initializer and update expressions are not needed.

correctness.name: noChildrenProp
correctness.description: Prevent passing of children as props.

correctness.name: noConstAssign
correctness.description: Prevents from having const variables being re-assigned.

correctness.name: noConstantCondition
correctness.description: Disallow constant expressions in conditions

correctness.name: noConstantMathMinMaxClamp
correctness.description: Disallow the use of Math.min and Math.max to clamp a value where the result itself is constant.

correctness.name: noConstructorReturn
correctness.description: Disallow returning a value from a constructor.

correctness.name: noEmptyCharacterClassInRegex
correctness.description: Disallow empty character classes in regular expression literals.

correctness.name: noEmptyPattern
correctness.description: Disallows empty destructuring patterns.

correctness.name: noFlatMapIdentity
correctness.description: Disallow to use unnecessary callback on flatMap.

correctness.name: noGlobalObjectCalls
correctness.description: Disallow calling global object properties as functions

correctness.name: noInnerDeclarations
correctness.description: Disallow function and var declarations that are accessible outside their block.

correctness.name: noInvalidBuiltinInstantiation
correctness.description: Ensure that builtins are correctly instantiated.

correctness.name: noInvalidConstructorSuper
correctness.description: Prevents the incorrect use of super() inside classes. It also checks whether a call super() is missing from classes that extends other constructors.

correctness.name: noInvalidDirectionInLinearGradient
correctness.description: Disallow non-standard direction values for linear gradient functions.

correctness.name: noInvalidGridAreas
correctness.description: Disallows invalid named grid areas in CSS Grid Layouts.

correctness.name: noInvalidNewBuiltin
correctness.description: Disallow new operators with global non-constructor functions.

correctness.name: noInvalidPositionAtImportRule
correctness.description: Disallow the use of @import at-rules in invalid positions.

correctness.name: noInvalidUseBeforeDeclaration
correctness.description: Disallow the use of variables and function parameters before their declaration

correctness.name: noNewSymbol
correctness.description: Disallow new operators with the Symbol object.

correctness.name: noNodejsModules
correctness.description: Forbid the use of Node.js builtin modules.

correctness.name: noNonoctalDecimalEscape
correctness.description: Disallow \8 and \9 escape sequences in string literals.

correctness.name: noPrecisionLoss
correctness.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

correctness.name: noPrivateImports
correctness.description: Restrict imports of private exports.

correctness.name: noRenderReturnValue
correctness.description: Prevent the usage of the return value of React.render.

correctness.name: noSelfAssign
correctness.description: Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same.

correctness.name: noSetterReturn
correctness.description: Disallow returning a value from a setter

correctness.name: noStringCaseMismatch
correctness.description: Disallow comparison of expressions modifying the string case with non-compliant value.

correctness.name: noSwitchDeclarations
correctness.description: Disallow lexical declarations in switch clauses.

correctness.name: noUndeclaredDependencies
correctness.description: Disallow the use of dependencies that aren't specified in the package.json.

correctness.name: noUndeclaredVariables
correctness.description: Prevents the usage of variables that haven't been declared inside the document.

correctness.name: noUnknownFunction
correctness.description: Disallow unknown CSS value functions.

correctness.name: noUnknownMediaFeatureName
correctness.description: Disallow unknown media feature names.

correctness.name: noUnknownProperty
correctness.description: Disallow unknown properties.

correctness.name: noUnknownUnit
correctness.description: Disallow unknown CSS units.

correctness.name: noUnmatchableAnbSelector
correctness.description: Disallow unmatchable An+B selectors.

correctness.name: noUnreachable
correctness.description: Disallow unreachable code

correctness.name: noUnreachableSuper
correctness.description: Ensures the super() constructor is called exactly once on every code  path in a class constructor before this is accessed if the class has a superclass

correctness.name: noUnsafeFinally
correctness.description: Disallow control flow statements in finally blocks.

correctness.name: noUnsafeOptionalChaining
correctness.description: Disallow the use of optional chaining in contexts where the undefined value is not allowed.

correctness.name: noUnusedFunctionParameters
correctness.description: Disallow unused function parameters.

correctness.name: noUnusedImports
correctness.description: Disallow unused imports.

correctness.name: noUnusedLabels
correctness.description: Disallow unused labels.

correctness.name: noUnusedPrivateClassMembers
correctness.description: Disallow unused private class members

correctness.name: noUnusedVariables
correctness.description: Disallow unused variables.

correctness.name: noUselessContinue
correctness.description: Avoid using unnecessary continue.

correctness.name: noVoidElementsWithChildren
correctness.description: This rules prevents void elements (AKA self-closing elements) from having children.

correctness.name: noVoidTypeReturn
correctness.description: Disallow returning a value from a function with the return type 'void'

correctness.name: useArrayLiterals
correctness.description: Disallow Array constructors.

correctness.name: useExhaustiveDependencies
correctness.description: Enforce all dependencies are correctly specified in a React hook.

correctness.name: useHookAtTopLevel
correctness.description: Enforce that all React hooks are being called from the Top Level component functions.

correctness.name: useImportExtensions
correctness.description: Enforce file extensions for relative imports.

correctness.name: useIsNan
correctness.description: Require calls to isNaN() when checking for NaN.

correctness.name: useJsxKeyInIterable
correctness.description: Disallow missing key props in iterators/collection literals.

correctness.name: useValidForDirection
correctness.description: Enforce "for" loop update clause moving the counter in the right direction.

correctness.name: useYield
correctness.description: Require generator functions to contain yield.

nursery.name: noAwaitInLoop
nursery.description: Disallow await inside loops.

nursery.name: noBitwiseOperators
nursery.description: Disallow bitwise operators.

nursery.name: noCommonJs
nursery.description: Disallow use of CommonJs module system in favor of ESM style imports.

nursery.name: noConstantBinaryExpression
nursery.description: Disallow expressions where the operation doesn't affect the value

nursery.name: noDescendingSpecificity
nursery.description: Disallow a lower specificity selector from coming after a higher specificity selector.

nursery.name: noDestructuredProps
nursery.description: Disallow destructuring props inside JSX components in Solid projects.

nursery.name: noDocumentCookie
nursery.description: Disallow direct assignments to document.cookie.

nursery.name: noDocumentImportInPage
nursery.description: Prevents importing next/document outside of pages/_document.jsx in Next.js projects.

nursery.name: noDuplicateCustomProperties
nursery.description: Disallow duplicate custom properties within declaration blocks.

nursery.name: noDuplicateElseIf
nursery.description: Disallow duplicate conditions in if-else-if chains

nursery.name: noDuplicateFields
nursery.description: No duplicated fields in GraphQL operations.

nursery.name: noDuplicateProperties
nursery.description: Disallow duplicate properties within declaration blocks.

nursery.name: noDynamicNamespaceImportAccess
nursery.description: Disallow accessing namespace imports dynamically.

nursery.name: noEnum
nursery.description: Disallow TypeScript enum.

nursery.name: noExportedImports
nursery.description: Disallow exporting an imported variable.

nursery.name: noFloatingPromises
nursery.description: Require Promise-like statements to be handled appropriately.

nursery.name: noGlobalDirnameFilename
nursery.description: Disallow the use of __dirname and __filename in the global scope.

nursery.name: noHeadElement
nursery.description: Prevent usage of \<head> element in a Next.js project.

nursery.name: noHeadImportInDocument
nursery.description: Prevent using the next/head module in pages/_document.js on Next.js projects.

nursery.name: noImgElement
nursery.description: Prevent usage of \ element in a Next.js project.

nursery.name: noImportCycles
nursery.description: Prevent import cycles.

nursery.name: noImportantStyles
nursery.description: Disallow the use of the !important style.

nursery.name: noIrregularWhitespace
nursery.description: Disallows the use of irregular whitespace characters.

nursery.name: noMissingVarFunction
nursery.description: Disallow missing var function for css variables.

nursery.name: noNestedTernary
nursery.description: Disallow nested ternary expressions.

nursery.name: noNoninteractiveElementInteractions
nursery.description: Disallow use event handlers on non-interactive elements.

nursery.name: noOctalEscape
nursery.description: Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

nursery.name: noProcessEnv
nursery.description: Disallow the use of process.env.

nursery.name: noProcessGlobal
nursery.description: Disallow the use of process global.

nursery.name: noRestrictedElements
nursery.description: Disallow the use of configured elements.

nursery.name: noRestrictedImports
nursery.description: Disallow specified modules when loaded by import or require.

nursery.name: noRestrictedTypes
nursery.description: Disallow user defined types.

nursery.name: noSecrets
nursery.description: Disallow usage of sensitive data such as API keys and tokens.

nursery.name: noStaticElementInteractions
nursery.description: Enforce that static, visible elements (such as \<div>) that have click handlers use the valid role attribute.

nursery.name: noSubstr
nursery.description: Enforce the use of String.slice() over String.substr() and String.substring().

nursery.name: noTemplateCurlyInString
nursery.description: Disallow template literal placeholder syntax in regular strings.

nursery.name: noTsIgnore
nursery.description: Prevents the use of the TypeScript directive @ts-ignore.

nursery.name: noUnknownAtRule
nursery.description: Disallow unknown at-rules.

nursery.name: noUnknownPseudoClass
nursery.description: Disallow unknown pseudo-class selectors.

nursery.name: noUnknownPseudoElement
nursery.description: Disallow unknown pseudo-element selectors.

nursery.name: noUnknownTypeSelector
nursery.description: Disallow unknown type selectors.

nursery.name: noUnresolvedImports
nursery.description: Warn when importing non-existing exports.

nursery.name: noUnwantedPolyfillio
nursery.description: Prevent duplicate polyfills from Polyfill.io.

nursery.name: noUselessEscapeInRegex
nursery.description: Disallow unnecessary escape sequence in regular expression literals.

nursery.name: noUselessEscapeInString
nursery.description: Disallow unnecessary escapes in string literals.

nursery.name: noUselessStringRaw
nursery.description: Disallow unnecessary String.raw function in template string literals without any escape sequence.

nursery.name: noUselessUndefined
nursery.description: Disallow the use of useless undefined.

nursery.name: noValueAtRule
nursery.description: Disallow use of @value rule in css modules.

nursery.name: useAdjacentOverloadSignatures
nursery.description: Disallow the use of overload signatures that are not next to each other.

nursery.name: useAriaPropsSupportedByRole
nursery.description: Enforce that ARIA properties are valid for the roles that are supported by the element.

nursery.name: useAtIndex
nursery.description: Use at() instead of integer index access.

nursery.name: useCollapsedIf
nursery.description: Enforce using single if instead of nested if clauses.

nursery.name: useComponentExportOnlyModules
nursery.description: Enforce declaring components only within modules that export React Components exclusively.

nursery.name: useConsistentCurlyBraces
nursery.description: This rule enforces consistent use of curly braces inside JSX attributes and JSX children.

nursery.name: useConsistentMemberAccessibility
nursery.description: Require consistent accessibility modifiers on class properties and methods.

nursery.name: useConsistentObjectDefinition
nursery.description: Require the consistent declaration of object literals. Defaults to explicit definitions.

nursery.name: useDeprecatedReason
nursery.description: Require specifying the reason argument when using @deprecated directive

nursery.name: useExplicitType
nursery.description: Enforce types in functions, methods, variables, and parameters.

nursery.name: useExportsLast
nursery.description: Require that all exports are declared after all non-export statements.

nursery.name: useForComponent
nursery.description: Enforce using Solid's \<For /> component for mapping an array to JSX elements.

nursery.name: useGoogleFontDisplay
nursery.description: Enforces the use of a recommended display strategy with Google Fonts.

nursery.name: useGoogleFontPreconnect
nursery.description: Ensure the preconnect attribute is used when using Google Fonts.

nursery.name: useGuardForIn
nursery.description: Require for-in loops to include an if statement.

nursery.name: useIterableCallbackReturn
nursery.description: Enforce consistent return values in iterable callbacks.

nursery.name: useNamedOperation
nursery.description: Enforce specifying the name of GraphQL operations.

nursery.name: useNamingConvention
nursery.description: Validates that all enum values are capitalized.

nursery.name: useNumericSeparators
nursery.description: Enforce the use of numeric separators in numeric literals.

nursery.name: useParseIntRadix
nursery.description: Enforce the consistent use of the radix argument when using parseInt().

nursery.name: useSortedClasses
nursery.description: Enforce the sorting of CSS utility classes.

nursery.name: useStrictMode
nursery.description: Enforce the use of the directive "use strict" in script files.

nursery.name: useSymbolDescription
nursery.description: Require a description parameter for the Symbol().

nursery.name: useTrimStartEnd
nursery.description: Enforce the use of String.trimStart() and String.trimEnd() over String.trimLeft() and String.trimRight().

nursery.name: useValidAutocomplete
nursery.description: Use valid values for the autocomplete attribute on input elements.

performance.name: noAccumulatingSpread
performance.description: Disallow the use of spread (...) syntax on accumulators.

performance.name: noBarrelFile
performance.description: Disallow the use of barrel file.

performance.name: noDelete
performance.description: Disallow the use of the delete operator.

performance.name: useTopLevelRegex
performance.description: Require regex literals to be declared at the top level.

security.name: noDangerouslySetInnerHtml
security.description: Prevent the usage of dangerous JSX props

security.name: noDangerouslySetInnerHtmlWithChildren
security.description: Report when a DOM element or a component uses both children and dangerouslySetInnerHTML prop.

security.name: noGlobalEval
security.description: Disallow the use of global eval().

style.name: noArguments
style.description: Disallow the use of arguments.

style.name: noCommaOperator
style.description: Disallow comma operator.

style.name: noDefaultExport
style.description: Disallow default exports.

style.name: noDoneCallback
style.description: Disallow using a callback in asynchronous tests and hooks.

style.name: noImplicitBoolean
style.description: Disallow implicit true values on JSX boolean attributes

style.name: noInferrableTypes
style.description: Disallow type annotations for variables, parameters, and class properties initialized with a literal expression.

style.name: noNamespace
style.description: Disallow the use of TypeScript's namespaces.

style.name: noNamespaceImport
style.description: Disallow the use of namespace imports.

style.name: noNegationElse
style.description: Disallow negation in the condition of an if statement if it has an else clause.

style.name: noNonNullAssertion
style.description: Disallow non-null assertions using the ! postfix operator.

style.name: noParameterAssign
style.description: Disallow reassigning function parameters.

style.name: noParameterProperties
style.description: Disallow the use of parameter properties in class constructors.

style.name: noRestrictedGlobals
style.description: This rule allows you to specify global variable names that you donâ€™t want to use in your application.

style.name: noShoutyConstants
style.description: Disallow the use of constants which its value is the upper-case version of its name.

style.name: noUnusedTemplateLiteral
style.description: Disallow template literals if interpolation and special-character handling are not needed

style.name: noUselessElse
style.description: Disallow else block when the if block breaks early.

style.name: noYodaExpression
style.description: Disallow the use of yoda expressions.

style.name: useAsConstAssertion
style.description: Enforce the use of as const over literal type and type annotation.

style.name: useBlockStatements
style.description: Requires following curly brace conventions.

style.name: useCollapsedElseIf
style.description: Enforce using else if instead of nested if in else clauses.

style.name: useConsistentArrayType
style.description: Require consistently using either T\[] or Array\<T>

style.name: useConsistentBuiltinInstantiation
style.description: Enforce the use of new for all builtins, except String, Number and Boolean.

style.name: useConst
style.description: Require const declarations for variables that are only assigned once.

style.name: useDefaultParameterLast
style.description: Enforce default function parameters and optional function parameters to be last.

style.name: useDefaultSwitchClause
style.description: Require the default clause in switch statements.

style.name: useEnumInitializers
style.description: Require that each enum member value be explicitly initialized.

style.name: useExplicitLengthCheck
style.description: Enforce explicitly comparing the length, size, byteLength or byteOffset property of a value.

style.name: useExponentiationOperator
style.description: Disallow the use of Math.pow in favor of the ** operator.

style.name: useExportType
style.description: Promotes the use of export type for types.

style.name: useFilenamingConvention
style.description: Enforce naming conventions for JavaScript and TypeScript filenames.

style.name: useForOf
style.description: This rule recommends a for-of loop when in a for loop, the index used to extract an item from the iterated array.

style.name: useFragmentSyntax
style.description: This rule enforces the use of \<>...\</> over \<Fragment>...\</Fragment>.

style.name: useImportType
style.description: Promotes the use of import type for types.

style.name: useLiteralEnumMembers
style.description: Require all enum members to be literal values.

style.name: useNamingConvention
style.description: Enforce naming conventions for everything across a codebase.

style.name: useNodeAssertStrict
style.description: Promotes the usage of node:assert/strict over node:assert.

style.name: useNodejsImportProtocol
style.description: Enforces using the node: protocol for Node.js builtin modules.

style.name: useNumberNamespace
style.description: Use the Number properties instead of global ones.

style.name: useNumericLiterals
style.description: Disallow parseInt() and Number.parseInt() in favor of binary, octal, and hexadecimal literals

style.name: useSelfClosingElements
style.description: Prevent extra closing tags for components without children

style.name: useShorthandArrayType
style.description: When expressing array types, this rule promotes the usage of T\[] shorthand instead of Array\<T>.

style.name: useShorthandAssign
style.description: Require assignment operator shorthand where possible.

style.name: useShorthandFunctionType
style.description: Enforce using function types instead of object type with call signatures.

style.name: useSingleCaseStatement
style.description: Enforces switch clauses have a single statement, emits a quick fix wrapping the statements in a block.

style.name: useSingleVarDeclarator
style.description: Disallow multiple variable declarations in the same variable statement

style.name: useTemplate
style.description: Prefer template literals over string concatenation.

style.name: useThrowNewError
style.description: Require new when throwing an error.

style.name: useThrowOnlyError
style.description: Disallow throwing non-Error values.

suspicious.name: noApproximativeNumericConstant
suspicious.description: Use standard constants instead of approximated literals.

suspicious.name: noArrayIndexKey
suspicious.description: Discourage the usage of Array index in keys.

suspicious.name: noAssignInExpressions
suspicious.description: Disallow assignments in expressions.

suspicious.name: noAsyncPromiseExecutor
suspicious.description: Disallows using an async function as a Promise executor.

suspicious.name: noCatchAssign
suspicious.description: Disallow reassigning exceptions in catch clauses.

suspicious.name: noClassAssign
suspicious.description: Disallow reassigning class members.

suspicious.name: noCommentText
suspicious.description: Prevent comments from being inserted as text nodes

suspicious.name: noCompareNegZero
suspicious.description: Disallow comparing against -0

suspicious.name: noConfusingLabels
suspicious.description: Disallow labeled statements that are not loops.

suspicious.name: noConfusingVoidType
suspicious.description: Disallow void type outside of generic or return types.

suspicious.name: noConsole
suspicious.description: Disallow the use of console.

suspicious.name: noConstEnum
suspicious.description: Disallow TypeScript const enum

suspicious.name: noControlCharactersInRegex
suspicious.description: Prevents from having control characters and some escape sequences that match control characters in regular expression literals.

suspicious.name: noDebugger
suspicious.description: Disallow the use of debugger

suspicious.name: noDoubleEquals
suspicious.description: Require the use of === and !==.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateAtImportRules
suspicious.description: Disallow duplicate @import rules.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateCase
suspicious.description: Disallow duplicate case labels.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateClassMembers
suspicious.description: Disallow duplicate class members.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateFontNames
suspicious.description: Disallow duplicate names within font families.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateJsxProps
suspicious.description: Prevents JSX properties to be assigned multiple times.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateObjectKeys
suspicious.description: Disallow two keys with the same name inside objects.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateParameters
suspicious.description: Disallow duplicate function parameter name.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateSelectorsKeyframeBlock
suspicious.description: Disallow duplicate selectors within keyframe blocks.

suspicious.name: noDuplicateTestHooks
suspicious.description: A describe block should not contain duplicate hooks.

suspicious.name: noEmptyBlock
suspicious.description: Disallow CSS empty blocks.

suspicious.name: noEmptyBlockStatements
suspicious.description: Disallow empty block statements and static blocks.

suspicious.name: noEmptyInterface
suspicious.description: Disallow the declaration of empty interfaces.

suspicious.name: noEvolvingTypes
suspicious.description: Disallow variables from evolving into any type through reassignments.

suspicious.name: noExplicitAny
suspicious.description: Disallow the any type usage.

suspicious.name: noExportsInTest
suspicious.description: Disallow using export or module.exports in files containing tests

suspicious.name: noExtraNonNullAssertion
suspicious.description: Prevents the wrong usage of the non-null assertion operator (!) in TypeScript files.

suspicious.name: noFallthroughSwitchClause
suspicious.description: Disallow fallthrough of switch clauses.

suspicious.name: noFocusedTests
suspicious.description: Disallow focused tests.

suspicious.name: noFunctionAssign
suspicious.description: Disallow reassigning function declarations.

suspicious.name: noGlobalAssign
suspicious.description: Disallow assignments to native objects and read-only global variables.

suspicious.name: noGlobalIsFinite
suspicious.description: Use Number.isFinite instead of global isFinite.

suspicious.name: noGlobalIsNan
suspicious.description: Use Number.isNaN instead of global isNaN.

suspicious.name: noImplicitAnyLet
suspicious.description: Disallow use of implicit any type on variable declarations.

suspicious.name: noImportAssign
suspicious.description: Disallow assigning to imported bindings

suspicious.name: noImportantInKeyframe
suspicious.description: Disallow invalid !important within keyframe declarations

suspicious.name: noLabelVar
suspicious.description: Disallow labels that share a name with a variable

suspicious.name: noMisleadingCharacterClass
suspicious.description: Disallow characters made with multiple code points in character class syntax.

suspicious.name: noMisleadingInstantiator
suspicious.description: Enforce proper usage of new and constructor.

suspicious.name: noMisplacedAssertion
suspicious.description: Checks that the assertion function, for example expect, is placed inside an it() function call.

suspicious.name: noMisrefactoredShorthandAssign
suspicious.description: Disallow shorthand assign when variable appears on both sides.

suspicious.name: noPrototypeBuiltins
suspicious.description: Disallow direct use of Object.prototype builtins.

suspicious.name: noReactSpecificProps
suspicious.description: Prevents React-specific JSX properties from being used.

suspicious.name: noRedeclare
suspicious.description: Disallow variable, function, class, and type redeclarations in the same scope.

suspicious.name: noRedundantUseStrict
suspicious.description: Prevents from having redundant "use strict".

suspicious.name: noSelfCompare
suspicious.description: Disallow comparisons where both sides are exactly the same.

suspicious.name: noShadowRestrictedNames
suspicious.description: Disallow identifiers from shadowing restricted names.

suspicious.name: noShorthandPropertyOverrides
suspicious.description: Disallow shorthand properties that override related longhand properties.

suspicious.name: noSkippedTests
suspicious.description: Disallow disabled tests.

suspicious.name: noSparseArray
suspicious.description: Prevents the use of sparse arrays (arrays with holes).

suspicious.name: noSuspiciousSemicolonInJsx
suspicious.description: It detects possible "wrong" semicolons inside JSX elements.

suspicious.name: noThenProperty
suspicious.description: Disallow then property.

suspicious.name: noUnsafeDeclarationMerging
suspicious.description: Disallow unsafe declaration merging between interfaces and classes.

suspicious.name: noUnsafeNegation
suspicious.description: Disallow using unsafe negation.

suspicious.name: noVar
suspicious.description: Disallow the use of var

suspicious.name: useAwait
suspicious.description: Ensure async functions utilize await.

suspicious.name: useDefaultSwitchClauseLast
suspicious.description: Enforce default clauses in switch statements to be last

suspicious.name: useErrorMessage
suspicious.description: Enforce passing a message value when creating a built-in error.

suspicious.name: useGetterReturn
suspicious.description: Enforce get methods to always return a value.

suspicious.name: useIsArray
suspicious.description: Use Array.isArray() instead of instanceof Array.

suspicious.name: useNamespaceKeyword
suspicious.description: Require using the namespace keyword over the module keyword to declare TypeScript namespaces.

suspicious.name: useNumberToFixedDigitsArgument
suspicious.description: Enforce using the digits argument with Number#toFixed().

suspicious.name: useValidTypeof
suspicious.description: This rule checks that the result of a typeof expression is compared to a valid value.
